docs.text: Bienvenue sur Documentation A propos de ce site ? C'est un site qui sert à mettre des documentations. Ce site est utilisé pour mes documentations c'est à dire celles de Vincent Bidard de la Noë. Il pourra y avoir aussi éventuellement des documentations de logiciels d'autres personnes. Mon Compte Github La création du site J'ai utilisé pour faire ce site Mkdocs hébergé gratuitement sur Github Pages . Toutes les documentations sont écrites en Markdown puis Mkdocs génère le code du site.
docs.title: Bienvenue sur Documentation

docs.text: Pass-manager Github page of the project Description Pass-manager is a command-line application which can manage passwords written in python. It uses sqlite3 to keep the passwords in the storage. Features list passwords add passwords Installation Create an alias Create a .pass-manager directory : mkdir ~/.pass-manager Clone the git repository in the folder : git clone https://github.com/Vinz2008/pass-manager.git . Run the install python script which create the database : python3 install.py launch this command : chmod +x ~/.pass-manager/launch.sh Add this line in your shell config file (~/.bashrc for bash and ~/.zshrc for zsh) to create an alias. alias pass-manager="~/.pass-manager/launch.sh"
docs.title: Pass-manager

docs.text: Pass-manager is a command-line application which can manage passwords written in python. It uses sqlite3 to keep the passwords in the storage.
docs.title: Description

docs.text: Create a .pass-manager directory : mkdir ~/.pass-manager Clone the git repository in the folder : git clone https://github.com/Vinz2008/pass-manager.git . docs.text: Rangen Github page of the project Rangen is a generator of random string written in Python. Rangen use the random library. I used makepip to create the pip package. Installation To install rangen,you need pip. You need to launch this command : pip install rangen
docs.title: Rangen

docs.text: search-cli It is a cli utility to search things with google. Github page of the project Installation Clone the repo : git clone https://github.com/Vinz2008/search-cli.git Then run this to install the dependencies : pip install -r requirements.txt Then copy the search file to /usr/bin : sudo cp search /usr/bin Change the rights to run the file : sudo chmod +x /usr/bin/search
docs.title: search-cli
